DOC.brief_summary: This study involves retrospective collection of data regarding the first approximately 100 iTotal Knee Replacement System surgeries and their short term outcomes at a small set of centers throughout the US.
DOC.brief_title: A Retrospective Study of the iTotal CR Knee Replacement System
DOC.criteria: 1. Clinical condition included in the approved Indications For Use 2. Has signed the informed consent form to allow review of medical records and collection of data therein. 3. > 18 years of age 1. Treatment with iTotal in a manner inconsistent with Instructions for Use 2. Unwilling to sign then informed consent form
